long_description: The men's Thorlo Trail Hiking socks are designed for trail hikes in a wide climate range on flat to varied terrain below the timberline. Exclusive fabric blend includes CoolMax(R) polyester and THOR-LON(R) acrylic to wick moisture and keep your feet feeling cooler. Moderate cushioning in balls and heels help reduce shock, impact, shear and blisters while providing temperature control. Light cushioning at insteps and arches provides lace pad pressure protection and improved fit. Strategically placed ventilation panels in the Thorlo Trail Hiking socks improve wicking. *Discount will be applied when you check out. Offer not valid for sale-price items ending in $._3 or $._9.
short_description: The men's Thorlo Trail Hiking socks are designed for trail hikes in a wide climate range on flat to varied terrain below the timberline.
